name: Keep the distance (The grey cat, DumbMoreThanDumb)
name_original: Keep the distance (The grey cat, DumbMoreThanDumb)
description:
My first game made with Godot Speedruns:

To get your name here, just comment a screenshot of the menu with speedrun times and I'll include your name in the list. IMPORTANT use incognito when speedrunning, because if you already completed the level, your new time won't save, so just refresh the incognito page before playing the same level again.

Level 1:

1st DumbMoreThanDumb(developer)4,552nd AngryKitten(developer)4,63rd

Level 2:

1st AngryKitten(developer)22,152nd DumbMoreThanDumb(developer)25,63rd

Level 3:

1st  DumbMoreThanDumb(developer)14,32nd AngryKitten(developer)14,433rd

Level 4:

1st2nd3rd How to play:
  • Do the tasks shown on shopping notes.
  • Keep social distance, because if your sickness bar fills up, medics will try to catch you. If they catch you, you lose. To make them stop you need to get your sickness bar to 0.
Controlls:
  • WASD move
  • E pick up
  • Q consume
  • SHIFT sprint
Consumables:
  • Fruits/Vegetables- replenishes stamina
  • Desinfectional liquid-lowers sickness bar
Credits:
  • Programming  The grey cat
  • Art DumbMoreThanDumb
